Happy Labor Day!

AMS is happy to honor all the hardworking individuals that make every day possible! 👩‍🏭👨‍🍳👩‍🌾👨‍🔧👩‍✈️

We hope our AMS students and families are having a well-rested 3-day weekend! Can't wait to see you tomorrow!



___



¡Feliz Día del Trabajo!

¡AMS está feliz de honrar a todas las personas trabajadoras que hacen posible cada día! 👩‍🏭👨‍🍳👩‍🌾👨‍🔧👩‍✈️

¡Esperamos que nuestros estudiantes de AMS y sus familias tengan un muy buen fin de semana largo de 3 días! ¡Estamos emocionados de tenerlos de regreso mañana!

📣🏫 ATTENTION AMS Families and Friends.



Reminder that the on-campus return date has changed and is scheduled for October 1st.



At AMS we remain committed to protecting the health and wellness of all our students, families, and staff as we navigate these unprecedented times.



___

Recuerde que la fecha de regreso en el campus ha cambiado y está programada para el 1ero de octubre.

post_text:
Happy Tuesday AMS students and families! The first week of distance learning went amazing! We are amazed at the dedication our parents and students have to learning.

Our dedicated teachers and staff are here to help and happy to answer any questions you have! For distance learning resources don't forget to visit: https://amscharters.org/distance-learning/

It's going to be a great week! 🌞

___

¡Feliz martes a los estudiantes y familias de AMS! ¡La primera semana de aprendizaje a distancia fue increíble! Estamos sorprendidos con la dedicación de los padres y de los estudiantes.

¡Nuestros maestros y personal están aquí para ayudar y están aquí para responder a cualquier pregunta que tengan! Para los recursos de aprendizaje a distancia no se olvide de visitarnos aquí: https://amscharters.org/distance-learning/

¡Sera otra gran semana! 🌞

post_text:
🎉 Congratulations Dragons! AMS-Desert Sky is proud to announce that we are 1 of 18 public K-12 schools that will be receiving “Expansion and Innovation Fund” grants! These grants will help Desert Sky equip students with an innovative, top-quality education, empowering them to succeed in both their academic and personal lives. Thank you A for Arizona for supporting schools and continued innovation during COVID-19.



___





🎉¡Felicitaciones Dragones! AMS-Desert Sky se enorgullece en anunciar que somos 1 de las 18 escuelas públicas K-12 que recibirá una beca de "Fondos para Expansión e Innovación"! Estas becas ayudarán a Desert Sky a equipar a los estudiantes con una educación innovadora y de alta calidad, permitiéndoles tener éxito tanto en su vida académica como en su vida personal. Gracias A for Arizona por apoyar las escuelas durante los cambios constantes durante COVID-19.

⏰ ONLY TWO MORE WEEKS until school starts! AMS is excited to welcome students back to distance learning and soon to our on-campus classrooms!

The safety of our students and staff is our top priority. That is why we created our updated Safety Plan for the 2020-21 school year! Click here to see the latest updates https://www.amsschools.org/apps/pages/COVID-19/Campus-Safety-Measures.

___



⏰ ¡SOLO DOS SEMANAS más hasta que empiece la escuela! ¡En AMS estamos emocionados en darle la bienvenida a los estudiantes de nuevo a través de nuestro programa de aprendizaje en línea a distancia y pronto en los salones de clase en persona!

La seguridad de nuestros estudiantes y del personal es nuestra máxima prioridad. ¡Es por eso es que hemos actualizado nuestro Plan de Seguridad para el año escolar 2020-21! Haga clic aquí para ver las últimas actualizaciones https://www.amsschools.org/apps/pages/COVID-19/Campus-Safety-Measures.

post_text:
Don’t wait to vote! We are excited to announce that AMS has been nominated for the 2021 Arizona Charter School of the Year!

• To cast your vote for AMS, visit https://azbigmedia.com/vote-ranking-arizona/
•… Select “Charter Schools”.
• Click “Vote” next to “Academies of Math and Science.”
• Enter your email and hit “Continue” and then proceed to enter your name and click “Submit.”

We want to ask that you please take a moment to vote for AMS! This is an award that we will all celebrate together!

¡No esperes para votar!

Estamos emocionados de anunciar que AMS ha sido nominada para la Escuela del Año de Arizona 2021!

• Para emitir su voto por AMS, visita https://azbigmedia.com/vote-ranking-arizona/
• Selecciona "Escuelas Charter".
• Haz clic en " Votar " junto a " Academias de Matemáticas y Ciencia."
• Ingresa tu correo electrónico y haz clic en "Continuar" y luego Procede a introducir su nombre y haga clic en " Enviar."

Queremos pedirle que por favor tomen un momento para votar por AMS! Este es un premio que lo haremos celebramos todos juntos!

All students will begin the school year starting August 5th. Students who have elected the on-campus program will begin the year learning remotely and will be returning to school on August 17th per Governor Ducey's executive order.

post_text:
Hi AMS Families! Governor Doucey has announced that the start date for schools has been pushed to August 17th. We are gathering more information regarding our online program which will resume as previously scheduled. In the meantime please continue to make your enrollment elections based on what you would like for your children for the first semester of school.

Hola familias de AMS! Gobernador Doucey anuncio que la fecha de inicio de las escuelas se demora hasta el 17 de agosto. Estamos reuniendo más información con respecto a nuestro programa en línea, pero mientras tanto por favor continúen haciendo sus elecciones de inscripción basadas en lo que les gustaría para sus hijos para el primer semestre de escuela.

post_text: Thank you Principal Walker. We agree. "Today, we take one more step forward, together."
shared_text:
Academy of Math and Science - Flower
June 19 at 7:27 AM ·

“Juneteenth is not just a date. Juneteenth is a spirit. Juneteenth is a mentality,” said Steve Williams, President of the National Juneteenth Observance Foundation.

Today, we honor #Juneteenth. We commemorate the moment, more than two years after President Lincoln’s Emancipation Proclamation, that “all slaves are free” finally rang loud and clear.

Today, we continue our work to build equitable, anti-racist environments and cultures in our schools where scholars and adults can grow and THRIVE. Today, we continue the fight for our scholars, our alumni, and our growing community. Today, we take one more step forward, together.
text:
Thank you Principal Walker. We agree. "Today, we take one more step forward, together."

Academy of Math and Science - Flower
June 19 at 7:27 AM ·

“Juneteenth is not just a date. Juneteenth is a spirit. Juneteenth is a mentality,” said Steve Williams, President of the National Juneteenth Observance Foundation.

Today, we honor #Juneteenth. We commemorate the moment, more than two years after President Lincoln’s Emancipation Proclamation, that “all slaves are free” finally rang loud and clear.

Today, we continue our work to build equitable, anti-racist environments and cultures in our schools where scholars and adults can grow and THRIVE. Today, we continue the fight for our scholars, our alumni, and our growing community. Today, we take one more step forward, together.

post_text:
We are proud to have our executive leadership in discussions and collaborating with Superintendents across the state, as well as the Governor and State Superintendent of Education, to address the potential challenges of the upcoming year. Our teams are working hard to plan for the upcoming year to provide our families with the best learning environment according to preference and needs of each unique scholar.

We can confidently say we will be opening our schools for families who are wanting to bring students back to a classroom and we are working through a plan to offer either hybrid or online options.

At AMS the health and safety of our students and faculty is one of our top priorities, but we will not lose sight of our mission to educate students to be the leaders of tomorrow. We will keep our AMS families informed with news and updates on Facebook, class Dojo and in newsletters.

post_text: We love our AMS Teachers!
shared_text:
Curtis Walker‎Academy of Math and Science - Flower
May 6 at 5:54 PM ·

Teachers. You are AMAZING. You are RESILIENT. You are INSPIRING. We cannot say enough about your dedication, your drive, your absolute commitment to your scholars. During the craziest time of our lives, you are finding the most inventive ways to stay connected, to keep teaching, and to keep learning going. We appreciate each and every one of you so much. We will be doing everything we can to shine a bright, bright light on your incredible work during this special week. But, it will not tell the full story... Of the moments where you connected with a student in need ❤️ ... Where all your scholars completed their remote learning assignments on time 🚀... Where you converted your dining room into a digital classroom 💻 From the bottom of our hearts, THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU. Please join us by thanking your teachers with a video, a story, a note, whatever it may be!

Please join us by thanking your teachers with a video, a story, a note, whatever it may be!

post_text:
AMS Desert Sky asked all their parents to share their love for their teachers! Here is what some parents said about Ms. Amezcua for always striving to reach the top even with the new challenges this year! Thank you for all that you do!

“She is on top of everything! She has great communication with her students and their parents especially during this difficult time we are all going through. To a lot of us parents this can be a little bit overwhelming not knowing how to manage school at home along with a regular job that we still have to attend to. However, Ms. Amezcua has been very helpful and patient in answering our hundreds of questions and sending instructional videos to her kindergartners. The kids feel like they are in a virtual classroom and that helps with making the children feel more at ease. Thank you, Ms. Amezcua, for all that you do!”

“Gracias por todo!”

“Gracias esta atenta a cualquier problema que tenga”

post_text: Former NFL Running Back came to AMS Flower to speak to our students about character and choices! Check it out! :)
shared_text:
Academy of Math and Science - Flower
February 21 at 10:07 AM ·

It's not everyday that you have a former NFL Running Back visit your school to talk about his journey to success and the power of choices with students.

Former NFL Running Back, Drew Anderson, who played for both the Denver Broncos and Arizona Cardinals, now spends his time speaking to youth organizations and schools about character and choices. We are extremely excited to have him here today at Academy of Math and Science - Flower!

shared_text:
Academy of Math and Science - Glendale is feeling thankful with Chamber Business News and A for Arizona.
August 29, 2019 at 1:18 PM ·

The Academy of Math & Science is proud to be one of five recipients of a grant from the A for Arizona Expansion Fund!

😍 AMS is honored by A for Arizona's recognition of our passion to deliver a high-quality #STEM-focused education to the communities that we impact.

🏫 With our grant from A for Arizona we opened your beautiful new school right here in Glendale.

❤️ It's a priveldge to have you with us!

http://bit.ly/2NCn2xt
